title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5904.5 - Application for designation as a Center for Advanced Technology
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5904.5 - Application for designation as a Center for Advanced Technology

State Regulations
(a) An application
for designation as a Center for Advanced Technology shall be filed with the
executive director on forms supplied by the foundation and shall conform to the
guidelines and instructions provided by the executive director. (b) The application shall address all of the
matters set forth in section
5904.6
of this Part to be
considered by the board in reviewing such applications. (c) An application shall be complete, in
proper form and verified by the responsible administrative and fiscal
representative(s) of the applicant. (d) The executive director shall acknowledge
receipt of the application and shall notify the applicant if he finds that the
application is incomplete. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5904.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
